entry.title: Kauai Plantation Railway (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that when construction began on the Kauai Plantation Railway (pictured), "nobody in the crew knew how to build a train track"?

entry.title: Sa'd ibn Junaydil (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Saudi Arabian historian Sa'd ibn Junaydil took high school graduation exams with his students, as he had yet to obtain a high school diploma?

entry.title: Treat Me (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Chloe Bailey dances next to a leopard in the music video for her song "Treat Me"?

entry.title: Nine Sinatra Songs (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Twyla Tharp's ballet Nine Sinatra Songs, to songs sung by Frank Sinatra, features ballroom dance-inspired choreography?

entry.title: Tetris Classic (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the illustrations in the 1992 video game Tetris Classic are based on scenes from Alexander Pushkin's poem Ruslan and Ludmila?

entry.title: Riddick Parker (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Riddick Parker increased his weight by 26 pounds (12 kg) because he was regarded as "small" for a defensive end, at 274 pounds (124 kg)?

entry.title: banks in ancient Rome (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that temples served as banks in ancient Rome?

entry.title: Archbishop William Henry Elder (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that artist Thomas Eakins remarked "I think you've got a heap of impudence" upon receiving the Temple Gold Medal for his portrait Archbishop William Henry Elder?
